name: Nscapplication
body:
### National Students Convention Registration and Attendance System.
This project is developed to help our institute in maintaining the registration of participants, keeping their record, marking attendance and generating results.

***

### Some Screenshots
Selecting role 
![](http://image.prntscr.com/image/68f814e27a8540c9bd498cdcf9fc7afa.png)

***

Registration Desk Login
![](http://image.prntscr.com/image/8ce11b3947f542ca9260ee0e2979a011.png)

***

Registration Desk Window after Login
![](http://image.prntscr.com/image/bfd95703558841c2878477389453ec2b.png)

***

Coordinator Desk Window after Login
![](http://image.prntscr.com/image/d53d56448afd408aa636fd82e40d2475.png)

Responsive Design for mobiles
![](http://image.prntscr.com/image/a6da76e089ab4ffb8bcf21c44c16db8f.png)

Note: This application is undergoing some changes. Do expect minor bugs :D
